attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CAN YOU PLEASE LOOK MORE CARE FULLY AT THE PAY CAREERS GET AS THY THE GOVERMENT A LOT OF MONEY OVER ONE YEAR

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
